body: The moral of the story is “America is shit and the capitalist dystopia you live in is far, far worse than the Red Scare fictions.” I had hoped that was implied, it seems lazy to say it outright. Plus if you do, people who agreed until the inevitable conclusion suddenly reel back in terror and take offense.
body_html: The moral of the story is “America is shit and the capitalist dystopia you live in is far, far worse than the Red Scare fictions.” I had hoped that was implied, it seems lazy to say it outright.
